title: Ayurveda COVID-19 Information
cleaned_text: In these difficult times when the whole world is fighting against the deadly Corona Virus, the all medical sciences are trying their best to find the antidote for it. Although the results are awaited soon meanwhile continuous efforts are being put in all round the globe to find suitable treatment for it. The ancient science of Ayurveda renders several principles which improve the immune system of the body. The strong immune system itself prevents the body from getting infected with dreadful viruses & bacteria or other organisms. Ayurveda has two basic principles viz. - To maintain and promote the health of the healthy individual & - To Cure the disease of the patients / diseased It is evidently explained in Ayurveda texts (Charak, Sushruta, Vagbhatta Samhitas) that maintenance of health is given prior importance and treating the diseased comes next in priority. Therefore by following Ayurveda's principles an individual will always remain healthy & even if he gets infected by any disease, he can be cured as well. The first case of Corona Virus infection was detected in Wuhan City of China in December 2019 hence WHO (World Health Organisation) coined the name Covid-19.
